sense.gloss: to seize, to catch, to grasp, to grip, to grab, to clutch, to hold, to catch hold of, to lay one's hands on
to obtain, to acquire, to get, to win, to capture
to understand, to grasp, to comprehend
getting rich quick, making a killing, making a fortune at a single stroke
to snatch (and run), to carry off, to swipe, to nab
to scoop up (and remove; sand, earth, etc.)
to carry off, to run away with, to sweep away, to snatch, to kidnap, to abduct
to take entirely for oneself, to monopolize

r_ele.r: いっかくせんきんをゆめみる

sense.gloss: to dream of making a fortune at one stroke, to dream of getting rich quickly

k_ele.e: 鳶に油揚げをさらわれる
鳶に油揚げを攫われる

r_ele.r: とんびにあぶらあげをさらわれる
とびにあぶらあげをさらわれる

sense.gloss: to be robbed of one's due, to have one's fried tofu snatched by a black kite
to capture all the popularity, to steal the show, to upstage
to kidnap, to abduct, to snatch, to carry people away, to take by force

sdata.j: ↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑一攫千金↑↓いっかくせんきん↓を↑夢見↑↓ゆめみ↓て↑宝↑↓たから↓くじを↑買↑↓か↓う。
sdata.e: A lot of people buy lotteries dreaming of wealth at one stroke.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はよく↑一攫千金↑↓いっかくせんきん↓を↑夢見↑↓ゆめみ↓ている。
sdata.e: He often tries to get rich at a single bound.

sdata.j: ↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑一攫千金↑↓いっかくせんきん↓を↑夢見↑↓ゆめみ↓て↑宝↑↓たから↓くじを↑買↑↓か↓う。
sdata.e: Many people buy lottery tickets with the dream of immediately becoming wealthy.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑一攫千金↑↓いっかくせんきん↓の↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑抱↑↓だ↓いて↑上京↑↓じょうきょう↓した。
sdata.e: He came to Tokyo with the dream of becoming rich.
